   (vi) DELSU accepts two (2) 'A' level passes to include a Social 
Science subject.  
(vii) LASU accepts 'A' level passes in two (2) relevant subjects.  
(viii) AAUA accepts ND upper credit in relevant programmes. 
Requires 'A' level passes in Government and one Social 
Science subject.  
(ix) IGBINEDION  -  As  for  Political 
 Science  and  Public  
Administration.  
(x) BOWEN accepts two (2) 'A' level passes to include 
Economics and any one of Government, Geography and 
History.  
(xi) TASUED requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Economics, 
Government/Political Science, Religious Studies, Geography 
and Social Studies.  
(xii) JOS accepts two (2) 'A' level passes in any of the Social 
Sciences. For IJMB, plus the UTME requirements.  
(xiii) ABU accepts two (2) 'A' level/IJMB passes which must 
include Sociology or Government/  History  and 
 any other subject.  
(xiv) AAU accepts two (2) 'A' level passes from Mathematics, 
Economics, Government and Geography.  
(xv) WESTERN-DEL – Same as in Political Science and Public 
Administration.  
(xvi) KWASU accepts IJMB and two (2) 'A' level passes in relevant 
subjects.  
(xvii) GOUU accepts BSc, BA or HND in any programme.  
(xviii) UMYUK accepts  
a. IJMB with a minimum of nine (9) points. The IJMB 
passes should include Sociology and two (2) other Social 
Science subjects.  
b. ND lower credit in a relevant programme.  
c. NCE credit in Social Studies with minimum of nine 
(9) points in overall grading.  
(xix) ABUJA – As in Political Science.  
(xx) ABUAD requires 'A' level passes or equivalents and any 
other two (2) subjects to include Government/History and 
Economics.
